name: THE_MACHINE_KNOWS_HATE
description:
Our entry for Ludum Dare 51 - "Every 10 Seconds"

They awake, and complete the trials set for them by The Machine, their keeper and tormenter. They are given only a brief flash of light to see their surroundings. They die, many times. It doesn't end.

The Machine Knows Hate is a challenging puzzle platformer with 20 unique levels.

The game carries content warnings for flashing lights and violent death.
